name: GraviSim
description:
GraviSim is a quaint gravity-simulation in which you fire projectiles into space and watch them interact with each other and with the planet that you are inhabiting. Try to complete orbit on all three planets!

Controls

Mouse - Operate the gun  and click to fire                                                                                                                                          

M and Arrow Keys - Hold down M and use the Arrow Keys to adjust the mass of you projectiles                                                                                                                                                                                           

V and Arrow Keys - Hold down V and use the Arrow Keys to adjust the velocity of your projectiles                                                                                                                                                            

 1, 2, 3 - Use 1, 2, and 3 to change the size and mass of your planet

More Information

GraviSim is the second game I've released, and I'm quite happy with it. Although I didn't have enough time to "gamify" it as much as I wanted, It's still fun to play around with for a few minutes. It would be greatly appreciated if you could provide feedback and report any bugs there may be. Thank you for your time, and for playing!
